description:
A Free and Open-Source program to free up disk space on your PC.

Temp_Cleaner GUI is yet another free and open-source piece of software made with your comfortability in mind, What makes Temp_Cleaner GUI different is that it respects your privacy and doesn't ask for a subscription unlike others, our program doesn't collect any sort of personal identification data and it has a lot of cleaning options that aren't available in many popular Free alternatives to this program.
What's new in version 7.1-stable of Temp_Cleaner GUI?:
    Removed the option "Free Up System RAM using RAMMap by Sysinternals"
    Maximum cleaning preset now doesn't check Visual Studio Code cleaning options by default.
    Added the option to rebuild icon cache (for Windows Explorer)
    Improved the behavior of the Windows Explorer Thumbnails Cleaner, it now restarts Explorer to help Windows rebuild thumbnails again.
    Fixed the bug of cleaning progress bar showing active even when cleaning process has stopped.
    Improved Exception handling in BeamNG.Drive Temporary files cleaner
    Improved Exception/Error handling in Cleaning thread & Main program cleaning function.
    Major bug fixes
    Please note that not all new features and bug fixes are listed here, and you may see other improvements/or new features that aren't listed here.
